game.name: SimplePlanes 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Your favorite sim, evolved! Build planes, cars, tanks, or anything you want! Download community crafts for free. New parts, new environments, multiplayer mayhem, endless sandbox fun, and more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your favorite sim, evolved! Build planes, cars, tanks, or anything you want! Download community crafts for free. New parts, new environments, multiplayer mayhem, endless sandbox fun, and more.
